name: The QWERTY Collection
description:
The QWERTY Collection is a collection of mini-games that I have created which focus the aim of the game around a QWERTY keyboard.

It should be considered pre-release, although it would doubtfully leave that phase as it's really just meant to be a toy for people to play with that I hope to make incrementally better.

There are 6 games at the moment which are a mix of single and multiplayer, however I'm open to suggestions - if you can think of a game that you would like me to add, feel free to leave the suggestion to me in the discussion boards.
